answers.answer: Pre-eclampsia is a scary thing on its own....then add the fact of delivering early....I would be a nervous wreck too....I had this my first pregnancy and was induced early (not as early as you) too!But keep in mind it's for the best to deliver early (both for you and baby) the risk are a lot more serious if you let the Pre-eclampsia go and it turns into full blown eclampsia!To help with nerves write down any concerns or fears you have....then take them with you to your doctor appointment and discuss the list.I did this with mine because let's face it pregnancy brain always happens to me when I hit the door to go to the doctors office...lol!Best of luck dear....

I was told by my doc at my last app. That im at risk of having preeclamsia ... Due to severe swelling on my feets legs ankles my hands also fall asleep ... Its horrible and very unconfortable .. None of my shoes fit or socks ... I had to do the 24 hour urine collection and had some blood work done  .. My doc called yesterday regarding the blood work and im a lil worry seens she would only call if something is wrong .. Im still waiting to call her seens shes not at her office yet

It will be ok. My first came unexpectedly at 31 weeks. Went in for a routine appointment and found out my blood pressure was so high that they had to take baby right away. My little one came out 2lbs 4ounces. She had to stay in hospital for 4 weeks and me 	in hospital for 2 weeks because couldn't get blood pressure to stay stable. When doc told me me and baby could have died I was thankful that 4 weeks of time was all I had to give up to get my baby home. I pray your experience is different but no matter what happens it will be ok.

I had preeclampsia and went into labor at 32weeks and they stopped it and I stayed in the hospital until I was 35 weeks and they had to induce me bc it got to bad but my baby girl was born healthy at 5lbs 15ozs and had no problems she was actually released from the hospital before I was
Can they tell you have that by taking your blood out ? Idk what to think Im still waiting to call my doctor and find out whats wrong

question: Im 32 weeks and 5 days and i have developed severe preeclampsia and have to deliver early and im completely nervous about it....
title: severe preeclampsia
